participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, with a passion for history and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I love gummy bears and never had kids. My idol is Thierry Henry. I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family. I want to be a museum curator. I have freckles all over my face.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and friendly, with a love for nature and animals.
participant_2.background: I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them. I'm going to hike some of the Appalachian Trail with my dragon friend. I'm a simple man. I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog. I make sure to get plenty of exercise, even if my diet is not the best.

content.text: Hi!
Hi!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike, play with my dog, and hang out with my friends and family.
That sounds fun. I like to play video games, read, and watch movies.
Oh cool, what kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play action and adventure games, like the Witcher 3 and Assassin's Creed.
I've never played those games before, but they sound cool. I mostly play sports games like FIFA and Madden.
Oh nice, I've played a little bit of FIFA.
Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets.
Oh, that's too bad. I have a French bulldog.
Aww, French bulldogs are so cute!
Yeah, they are.
So what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool. I'm a museum curator.
Wow, that sounds like a really interesting job.
It is. I get to work with a lot of cool historical artifacts.
That's awesome.
So what's your favorite thing to do with your family?
We like to go on hikes together.
That sounds like a lot of fun.
Yeah, it is
